sentences.sContent: Studies show that comments indicating misbehavior increase males' perceived physical attractiveness, but the same kind of comments have the opposite effect on females'.
sentences.sContent_eng: Studies show that comments indicating misbehavior increase males' perceived physical attractiveness, but the same kind of comments have the opposite effect on females'.
sentences.sCn: 研究表明，暗示品行不端的评论加大了男性对身体魅力感知，但是同样类型的评论对女性而言则有反效果。

remMethod.val: mis (坏) + behavior (行为) → 品行不端

words.tran: 不正当举止；行为无礼貌
使举止失礼；使行为不端
